item.title: 卢特尼克商务部长任命听证会的最新进展
item.description: Howard Lutnick 摄影师：Al Drago/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Howard Lutnick Photographer: Al Drago/Bloomberg】

item.title: 美国商品贸易逆差因进口增加而扩大至创纪录水平
item.description: 由于进口额增加，12 月份美国商品贸易逆差扩大，创下历史新高。【原文：The US merchandise-trade deficit widened in December to a record as the value of imports increased.】

item.title: Icis 称欧洲电力交易将继续激增
item.description: 据一位行业顾问称，在投机和天气相关头寸增加的推动下，去年欧洲电力交易活动的跃升势头有望在 2025 年继续保持。【原文：Last year’s jump in European power trading activity is poised to continue in 2025, driven by an increase in speculative and weather-related positions, according to an industry consultant.】

item.title: 移动应用程序制造商 Dream Games 讨论 25 亿美元融资事宜
item.description: Dream Games 是土耳其一家热门手机游戏（包括《皇家比赛》）开发商，该公司正在与投资者谈判，希望通过新一轮债务和股权融资筹集约 25 亿美元，这将使该公司在不到三年的时间里估值翻一番。【原文：Dream Games, a Turkish developer of popular mobile games including Royal Match, is in talks with investors to raise around $2.5 billion in fresh debt and equity in a round that would almost double the firm’s valuation in less than three years.】

item.title: 加纳正在商谈 27 亿美元商业贷款的重组事宜
item.description: 加纳财政部长卡西尔-阿托-福尔松（Cassiel Ato Forson）周三表示，加纳正在与 60 家国际银行谈判，以重新安排 27 亿美元的贷款。【原文：Ghana is negotiating with 60 international banks to rework $2.7 billion in loans, Minister of Finance Cassiel Ato Forson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行下调利率已成定局，价格目标仍可期待：决策指南
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）将在第五次会议上降低利率，因为通胀率已接近 2% 的目标，这使得官员们可以进一步放松对经济的束缚。【原文：The European Central Bank is set to lower interest rates for a fifth meeting as inflation that’s nearing the 2% target lets officials further loosen the shackles on the economy.】

item.title: 阿根廷能源出口激增缓解了对货币管理的担忧
item.description: 阿根廷蓬勃发展的能源行业缓解了人们的担忧，即坚挺的比索将阻碍阿根廷在即将到来的债务偿还期前加强外汇储备的努力。【原文：Argentina’s booming energy sector is easing concerns that a strong peso will dent efforts to bolster foreign exchange reserves ahead of looming debt payments.】

item.title: 花旗银行发行与空中客车股票挂钩的罕见可交换债券
item.description: 花旗集团发行的债券在债务到期时可兑换成空中客车公司的股票价值，这在欧洲是一种不同寻常的发行类型。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is offering bonds that are exchangeable into the value of Airbus SE shares when the debt matures, an unusual type of issuance in Europe.】

item.title: 特朗普将监督美国风电场实现创纪录的增长
item.description:
在未来四年内，发电能力预计将增加 54 千兆瓦，超过了他在第一任期内创下的最高纪录。【原文：

Capacity is expected to increase by 54 gigawatts during the next four years, surpassing the previous high set during his first term.

】

item.title: 华尔街的杠杆 ETF 热潮是价值近 10 亿美元的摇钱树
item.description: 一种深受市场投机者喜爱的 ETF 交易，正迅速成为脚步灵活的金融公司创造数十亿美元收入的利器。【原文：A popular ETF trade beloved by market speculators is fast turning into a billion-dollar revenue generator for nimble-footed financial firms.】

item.title: 苹果公司在财报发布前因 iPhone 风险再次被下调评级
item.description: 奥本海默公司（Oppenheimer）将苹果公司的评级从 "跑赢大盘 "下调至 "表现良好"，这是该公司业绩公布前谨慎情绪升温的最新迹象。【原文：Apple Inc. was downgraded to perform from outperform at Oppenheimer, in the latest sign of caution building ahead of the company’s results.】

item.title: KKR 战略入股医疗用品集团 Henry Schein
item.description: KKR & Co. 已战略入股 Henry Schein 公司 12%的股份，并将与该公司合作改善这家全球最大的牙医和医生医疗产品分销商的运营。【原文：KKR & Co. has taken a 12% strategic stake in Henry Schein Inc and will work with the company to improve operations at the world’s largest distributor of medical products to office-based dentists and doctors.】

item.title: 德国政府在大选前下调经济增长预期
item.description: 德国政府将今年的经济增长预期从1.1%下调至0.3%，这是欧洲最大经济体仍深陷长期停滞的最新迹象。【原文：The German government chopped back its growth forecast for this year to 0.3% from 1.1%, the latest sign Europe’s biggest economy remains mired in a prolonged period of stagnation.】

item.title: 南非审计长称 Eskom 的生存能力面临风险
item.description: 据南非审计长称，尽管南非国家电力公司已经稳定了电力供应，但其财务生存能力仍面临风险。【原文：The financial viability of South Africa’s state power utility remains at risk even though it has stabilized the electricity supply, according to the nation’s auditor-general.】

item.title: T-Mobile 盈利超出预期，移动用户增加
item.description: 受惠于无线用户和家庭互联网用户的持续增长，T-Mobile US Inc.【原文：T-Mobile US Inc. reported fourth-quarter results that beat analysts’ projections, benefiting from continued growth in wireless subscribers and home internet customers.】

item.title: 全食超市工会面临与亚马逊签订合同的艰巨任务
item.description: 欢迎阅读《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，斯宾塞-索珀（Spencer Soper）撰文指出，费城一家全食超市（Whole Foods）门店的工会选举不可能很快让工人与亚马逊签订合同。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Spencer Soper writes that the union election at a Whole Foods store in Philadelphia isn’t likely to produce a contract for the workers with Amazon soon.】

item.title: 鲍威尔面临特朗普上台后的首个美联储日考验
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们关注美联储主席鲍威尔的大日子。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at Fed Chair Powell’s big day. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 美联储 2019 年工作报告回顾特朗普关税带来的强劲增长阻力
item.description: 美联储政策制定者们今天结束了为期两天的会议，结束了他们在唐纳德-特朗普总统第二个任期内的首次聚会。【原文：Federal Reserve policy makers finish a two-day meeting today, wrapping up their first gathering under a second term of President Donald Trump that’s already spreading uncertainty through America’s heartland and across the world about US trade policy.】

item.title: 德国商业银行拒绝为阻止 Orcel 而进行的大额交易
item.description: 在寻求保持德国商业银行独立性的过程中，贝蒂娜-奥尔洛普（Bettina Orlopp）得出结论，大型收购可能不是解决问题的办法。【原文：In her quest to keep Commerzbank AG independent, Bettina Orlopp has concluded that large acquisitions probably aren’t the answer.】

item.title: 特朗普对哥伦比亚发动的 9 小时经济战震撼新兴市场
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得总统职位以来的大部分时间里，哥伦比亚似乎都没有被他放在眼里。他一心扑在墨西哥和中国等问题上，对哥伦比亚几乎只字未提，这让波哥大的交易商们信心十足，不断抬高比索和股票价格。【原文：For most of the time since Donald Trump won office, Colombia appeared safely out of his crosshairs. Preoccupied with the likes of Mexico and China, he barely uttered a word about the country, giving traders in Bogota the confidence to steadily bid up the peso and stock prices.】

item.title: 黄金市场推出分类账，追踪从精炼厂到金库的金条
item.description: 黄金市场启动了一个数字数据库，以追踪金块，并将非法来源的贵金属拒之于市场之外。【原文：The gold market has launched a digital database to track bullion and keep precious metal from illicit sources out of the market.】

item.title: 杰富瑞称 WH Smith 出售门店可能意味着违约事件
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）可转换债券部称，英国零售商 WH Smith Plc 可能出售其高街业务，这有可能引发债务违约事件。【原文：British retailer WH Smith Plc’s potential sale of its high street business risks triggering an event of default on its debt, according to the convertible bond desk at Jefferies.】

item.title: ASML 自 2020 年以来的最大涨幅在图表上只是一闪而过
item.description: 在订单量超预期激增的推动下，ASML Holding NV 的股价迎来了自 2020 年 3 月以来最好的一天。然而，从图表上看，这一飞跃并不明显。【原文：Supercharged by an estimate-beating surge in order bookings, shares of ASML Holding NV are having their best day since March 2020. Yet look at a chart dating back that far and the leap is barely noticeable.】

item.title: 瑞士将在关系改善之际终止欧盟股市措施
item.description: 瑞士将把欧盟从其股市保护名单中除名，这是在双方同意达成协议重塑关系后，瑞士于 2019 年实施的一项措施。【原文：Switzerland will remove the European Union from its stock market protection list, rolling back a measure it imposed in 2019 after both sides agreed to a deal to revamp their relations.】

item.title: 高盛策略师称科技股大跌并非熊市信号
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The tech-led selloff in US equities at the start of this week was just a blip, given the positive outlook for the economy, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 科技财报和美联储日可能让交易员忘记 DeepSeek
item.description: 在短暂的科技股飙升之后，投资者们又回到了正常的节目中：美联储和财报将成为焦点。【原文：After the brief tech-stock freakout, it’s back to regular programming for investors: The Fed and earnings are taking center stage.】

item.title: 大石油公司盈利下滑，投资者回报承压
item.description: 全球最大石油公司的股息和回购资金流面临压力，第四季度利润大幅下滑，唐纳德-特朗普总统的回归又增加了不确定性。【原文：The flow of dividends and buybacks from the world’s largest oil companies is under pressure, with fourth-quarter profits plunging and the return of President Donald Trump adding to the uncertainty.】

item.title: 特朗普竞选经理和前纽约联储主席加入 Coinbase 担任顾问
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc. 将把曾担任唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统竞选活动联合竞选经理的克里斯-拉西维塔（Chris LaCivita）和前纽约联邦储备银行行长威廉-杜德利（William Dudley）纳入这家美国最大加密货币交易所的全球顾问委员会。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. is adding Chris LaCivita, who was co-campaign manager for Donald Trump’s presidential campaign, and former Federal Reserve Bank of New York President William Dudley to the largest US cryptocurrency exchange’s global advisory council.】

item.title: 特斯拉 6000 亿美元的增长超越了电动汽车增长的主要风险
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）的股价自上次发布财报以来几乎翻了一番；这种情况通常意味着人们对即将发布的财报寄予厚望。但是，特斯拉的汽车销售业务已经成为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）政治地位的配角。【原文：Tesla Inc. shares have nearly doubled in value since the last time the company reported earnings— a set-up that usually spells high expectations for upcoming results. But its car-selling business has become a sideshow to Elon Musk’s political prominence.】

item.title: TikTok 获准向泰国数据项目投资 38 亿美元
item.description: 泰国政府批准社交媒体平台 TikTok 投资 38 亿美元用于数据托管服务，因为这个东南亚国家正努力成为数据中心和云服务的中心。【原文：Social media platform TikTok won Thai government approval to invest $3.8 billion in data hosting services, as the Southeast Asian country pushes to become a hub for data centers and cloud services.】
